choices: Dana looks down and sees Ryan...
Dana looks down, sees Ryan and doesn't care...
15232.content:
Dana looked down as she settled her feet into her favorite sandals. She had had them for years and even she had to admit that they were old and reeking of her perspiration; the leather was frayed and worn, the soles thin, the little toe strap about to snap. She didn't care. One more trip...

Dana's big green eyes grew wide as she saw something squirming down by her toes.She leaned in with a grin watching as the little thing scrambled to get out of the way of her invading toe, flexing her foot and scrunching just as it seemed it mi ght escape. Her toes drew it back and she giggled.

"Not so fast, Bug!" Dana laughed as she pressed down with her big toe little realizing that it was not a bug in fact, but her best friend that she was tormenting. Truth be told, if Dana actually knew that it was her friend Ryan under her toe she would not have cared. She loved bugs; Squishing them underfoot, or unde5r her big ass... eating them even. She shivered at the though of the tiny helpless creature totally at her mercy. What a rush!

Meanwhile Ryan cowered and screamed as Dana's huge toe came down pressing him into the insole of the sandal. He pushed on the massive weight, pressing hard as Dana simply relaxed her toe and forced him into the leather of her old, smelly shoe. She could not imagine the stench the bug was experiencing but she knew it had to be gross; the sandals were so old. Tough, she finally thought. Your problem, Bug, not mine. Suffer.,..

Dana pressed her toe into the sandal and Ryan screamed in agony...
15232.title: foot

choices: Dana offers to let Ryan live as her personal insole
152322.content:
Upon hearing a scream that sounded a lot like her friend Ryan’s scream, Dana briefly raised her toe and moved her face closer to get a better look at the bug. Upon having the pressure of Dana’s massive toe relieved, Ryan stands up, looks up and makes eye contact with his friend Dana.

Dana clearly sees that the bug she tortured under her toe was in fact her friend Ryan. However, the pleasure of her torturing and crushing a bug outweighed what she cared about Ryan. Looking at him, she let out a sadistic grin. Ryan watched in horror as her colossal toe came down, knocking him off his feet, now lying face-up with his back on her sandal.

Dana giggles “you’re just a bug now” as she slowly descended her toe. Ryan let out a scream but was soon silenced as Dana’s massive toe covered his entire body and face, pressing part of Dana’s toeskin into his mouth, muffling his scream. Ryan helplessly tried to squirm but due to the pressure of Dana’s toe, he was unable to move.

Ryan felt betrayed as he was further compressed between Dana’s toe and the leather sandal. Dana laughed at the joy of crushing her now former friend. Ryan felt as if his body would cave in at any moment.
152322.title: Dana looks down, sees Ryan and doesn't care...

1523221.content:
Overcome by the joy pf crushing bugs, Dana presses her toe all the way down. Unable to move or scream, Ryan can only have thoughts of horror as the pressure of Dana’s toe slowly increases. His mouth is completely forced open by the sheer pressure of her toeskin, and he feels his ribs start to crack.

SPLAT!

Ryan’s body caves in under the pressure, and all that remains of him is a bloody smear, partially on Dana’s sandal and partially on her big toe.
1523221.title: Dana completely squishes Ryan

153.content: "EEEWWWW!" Dana squeals. "That bug is disgusting!" she says. Before you could even get up, Dana's big toe is already on top of you and your are pushed against the surface of then sandal. The last words you ever hear are horrifying, "DIE YOU DISGUSTING BUG!" After that, the only memory of your life on earth is a stain on Dana's big toe.
